name: PATRIOTIC MILLIONAIRES
sampleDescriptions: Legislative efforts in support of economic relief that prioritizes the needs of working people during the COVID-19 crisis and efforts to increase the minimum wage; FY21 Budget Resolution (H.Con.Res.11
